content.description:
The crux is right off the ground.  (SDS) on some small crimps just right of "

Gain & Loss

" and below a sloping shelf.  Pull up on the crimps and toss big for a sloper.  Match it up the sloper and finish as for "

Gain & Loss

."

After hitting the sloper from the crimps, there are many possible variations and finishes for a little added fun.

Fun, short, little, power move that finishes on fun, tall terrain.  Check it!!
content.location: Approach via the "Peabody Wall" description.  About a ten minute or less hike in to this wall.

content.description: Climb the face and arete located just right of the block found at the base of the wall.
content.location: Park in the 2nd lot and head EAST on the "Bluebird Meadow" trail to intersect with "Silver Fox" trail.  Continue heading NORTH (you can see "Gilligan Island" on your left) to the "Sisters Trail."  After about 50-100 yards, break NORTH (right) up into the woods where you will find these striking boulders.

content.description: On the right-most block climb the imposing looking face just left of a large block found at the base of the wall.  Technical and powerful!!!
content.protection: A few pads and a spot.
content.location: Park in the 2nd lot and head EAST on the "Bluebird Meadow" trail to intersect with "Silver Fox" trail.  Continue heading NORTH (you can see "Gilligan Island" on your left) to the "Sisters Trail."  After about 50-100 yards break NORTH (right) up into the woods where you will find these striking boulders.

content.description:
Climb (L)->(R) or (R)->(L) across the right most block in the area.  Good for a nice pump.  To add a little extra make the (R)->(L) traverse then continue on to finish with "

Gain & Loss

."  This adds to the difficulty by about a V-grade or so!!  Very fun.
content.location: Park in the 2nd lot and head EAST on the "Bluebird Meadow" trail to intersect with "Silver Fox" trail.  Continue heading NORTH (you can see "Gilligan Island" on your left) to the "Sisters Trail."  After about 50-100 yards break NORTH (right) up into the woods where you will find these striking boulders.

content.description:
Begin on the far right side of the "Peabody Wall" on the same starting holds as for "

Multi-Use Traverse

."  Traverse just left of "

Point of Origin

" and move up and left on a few bad holds until rejoining the upper finish on "

Gain & Loss

."  Good warm-up and lots of fun.
content.location: Location directions are the same as for the "Peabody Wall" approach directions.

content.description: There are two blocks in this area.  This line climbs up and sightly right working up the left side arete on the right/main "Peabody Wall."  Lots of fun...  much harder than it looks!!
content.location: Park in the 2nd lot and head EAST on the "Bluebird Meadow" trail to intersect with "Silver Fox" trail.  Continue heading NORTH (you can see "Gilligan Island" on your left) to the "Sisters Trail."  After about 50-100 yards break NORTH (right) up into the woods where you will find these striking boulders.
